verbLexeme: 1. To have a look around a place.
2. To travel and look around a place to see what it is like. English = explore.
3. To look at things in a casual way in a shop, in the hope that you might find something you want. English = browse.
4. To wander or travel around an area without having a particular purpose. English = roam.
nominalLexeme: 1. A person who travels to places about which very little is known, in order to discover what is there. English = explorer.
2. A journey to a place about which very little is known in order to discover what is there. English = exploration.
